Events/Music
Live Music & Brunch at AJ's Grayton Beach!
Sunday September 7th
Sunday may 8th
Every Sunday
Recharge your weekend at our live music brunch with the talented duo, Christon Birge Duo! Join us every Sunday at 12 PM for a delightful morning filled with delicious food, refreshing drinks, and engaging tunes.
Indulge in our mouth-watering brunch menu while enjoying the vibrant sounds of Christon Birge Duo as they serenade you with their lively performances. It’s the perfect way to unwind and connect with friends and family.
Don’t miss this fantastic combination of great music and delectable dishes! Make your Sunday special at AJ's Grayton Beach. We can't wait to see you there!
ks, and engaging tunes.

Don’t miss this fantastic combination of great music and delectable d

Live Music with Kevin Carson
Monday September 8th
Sunday may 8th
Every Monday
Get ready for a night filled with fun and great music! Join us for a special performance by Kevin Carson, known for his catchy tunes and engaging originals like "Living on 30A". Whether you’re a fan of his music or just looking for a fun night out, Kevin's performance is guaranteed to be an enjoyable experience for everyone.

Thursday September 11th
Sunday may 8th
Every Thursday
Join us every Thursday night for an unforgettable Karaoke experience at AJ's Grayton Beach! Whether you're a shower singer or a seasoned performer, this is your chance to take the stage and show off your talent.**Gather your friends, grab a drink, and get ready to make some noise! Don't miss out on an amazing night of fun, laughter, and music!

Live Music with Bryan Bludworth at AJ's Grayton Beach
Friday September 12th
Sunday may 8th
Every Friday
Join us every Friday afternoon at **4 PM** for a fantastic live performance by Bryan Bludworth, just in time for Happy Hour!      Enjoy great music, delicious drinks, and the perfect beach atmosphere to kick off your weekend! Don't miss out on the fun and bring your friends along to celebrate the start of the weekend!

Rocky Horror Interactive Murder Mystery Dinner Show
Saturday October 18th
Sunday may 8th
Join ICMT Murder Mystery Company & AJ’s Grayton Beach for a **Rocky Horror** themed interactive mystery dinner show!   **A murder mystery dinner show - where YOU become the detective!** Prepare for a thrilling evening filled with suspense, laughter, and a delicious meal as you work to solve the murder in this interactive mystery game!
**The Plot…** Rocky Horror Murder Mystery Show:* Do the Time Warp again with your favorite cast members as they reunite for a special affair! Everyone is shivering with antici…pation, but when a murder happens after “a toast,” YOU and Dr. Frank N. Furter embark on a strange journey. Someone has tasted blood, and they want more! **Dress Attire:**   Come in your favorite Rocky Garb! **Ticket Information:**    **$65 per seat general admission** (plus taxes & fees)   *Ticket price includes a 3-course meal with salad, your choice of three different entrees, and a specialty dessert.*
* Bar service is available (for purchase) at this venue.
**Show Details:**   This show features actors in a live, interactive, and comedic experience with audience members as they work to solve the "murder" through physical clues, spoken dialogue, and inferred character motives.
* *This show has some ADULT themes - Rocky Horror theme. PG 13*
**Seating is limited, so grab your tickets now!** ** Purchase Tickets on Eventbrite
**Don't miss out on an unforgettable night of mystery, music, and mayhem! We can’t wait to see you there! **
06:30 PM - 09:00 PM
2025-10-18 18:30:00
2025-10-18 21:00:00
America/Chicago

Saturday October 18th

Join ICMT Murder Mystery Company & AJ’s Grayton Beach for a **Rocky Horror** themed interactive mystery dinner show!   **A murder mystery dinner show - where YOU become the detective!** Prepare for a thrilling evening filled with suspense, laughter, and a delicious meal as you work to solve the murder in this interactive mystery game!
**The Plot…** Rocky Horror Murder Mystery Show:* Do the Time Warp again with your favorite cast members as they reunite for a special affair! Everyone is shivering with antici…pation, but when a murder happens after “a toast,” YOU and Dr. Frank N. Furter embark on a strange journey. Someone has tasted blood, and they want more! **Dress Attire:**   Come in your favorite Rocky Garb! **Ticket Information:**    **$65 per seat general admission** (plus taxes & fees)   *Ticket price includes a 3-course meal with salad, your choice of three different entrees, and a specialty dessert.*
* Bar service is available (for purchase) at this venue.
**Show Details:**   This show features actors in a live, interactive, and comedic experience with audience members as they work to solve the "murder" through physical clues, spoken dialogue, and inferred character motives.
* *This show has some ADULT themes - Rocky Horror theme. PG 13*
